title.narrative: Support to South Africa's Revitalised Response to Health and AIDS

description.narrative: This activity (Support to South Africa's Revitalised Response to Health and AIDS) is a component of Strengthening South Africa’S Revitalised Response to AIDS and Health (SSARRAH) reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £30,987,441. This component benefits South Africa, and works in the following sector(s): STD control including HIV/AIDS, Public finance management (PFM), Democratic participation and civil society. , with the following implementing partners: Coffey International Development. The start date is 01-01-2010 and the end date is 31-01-2017.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

description.narrative: Accountability - General Public Service - Accountability - debt and aid management
Health - Social Affairs - Health - policy, planning and administration
Other General Services - General Public Service - Other General Services - support to civil society
Aggregated spend of less than £500 - Financial Year 2010 Quarter 4
